summary: Diff adds a new single-page landing composition (App.tsx) with navbar, hero video, watermark, sections, CTAs, scroll progress, and footer. Several spec mismatches remain: Campus Buzz item text/emojis, Real App Experience copy/layout/assets, final CTA button label, and hero video lazy-load behavior. Also introduces unrequested third-party icon libraries and edits/adds files in immutablePaths.

missing_requirements.requirement: Use the user-provided real screenshots inside phone mockups with the provided headlines/paragraphs appearing verbatim, and screenshots displayed within phone mockups using the provided phone mockup frame asset.
missing_requirements.reason: The section exists and alternates layout for the first two blocks, but the copy shown is not guaranteed/verbatim (and includes non-goal copy about UPI/OTP), and the phone frame asset is not used (mockup uses a simple border overlay rather than the provided phone-mockup-frame image).

missing_requirements.requirement: Campus Buzz Preview feed must display the three specified items verbatim including emojis: ‚Äúüî• 50% off after 4 PM‚Äù, ‚Äúüì¢ Print shop closing at 7 PM‚Äù, ‚Äúüéâ Free fries with combo meal‚Äù.
missing_requirements.reason: Feed texts omit the required leading emojis and therefore are not verbatim.

missing_requirements.requirement: Final CTA section must have a large glowing ‚ÄúDownload‚Äù button (same configurable link as other Download CTAs).
missing_requirements.reason: The final CTA button label is ‚ÄúDownload Now‚Äù, not ‚ÄúDownload‚Äù.

missing_requirements.requirement: Lazy-load the hero video (not eagerly blocking initial render) and show fallback image if video fails/cannot autoplay.
missing_requirements.reason: Fallback image handling exists via `poster` and `videoError`, but there is no clear evidence of lazy-loading behavior (e.g., `preload="none"`, intersection-based loading, or conditional source attachment). The component also calls `video.play()` immediately on mount.

missing_requirements.requirement: Add premium interaction touches including subtle parallax scrolling where appropriate (while respecting reduced motion).
missing_requirements.reason: Fade-in, hover glow, reduced-motion handling, and scroll progress indicator are present, but there is no evidence of any parallax implementation in the provided diff summary.

hallucinated_features.description: Introduced unrequested third-party icon libraries (lucide-react and react-icons) for landing UI icons.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest does not request adding icon libraries; diff shows usage of these packages in multiple components.

hallucinated_features.description: Added marketing/footer attribution link to caffeine.ai with UTM parameters.
hallucinated_features.reason: Footer requirements did not include external attribution; this is additional content/behavior beyond spec.
Landing page work did not request backend changes; this backend addition appears unrelated to the marketing page UI.

hallucinated_features.description: Changes/additions to immutablePaths (useActor.ts, useInternetIdentity.ts) despite constraint that these must not be edited.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest explicitly marks these paths as immutable; diff summary shows these paths added (which implies modification/replacement in a real repo).

hallucinated_features.description: Added copy claiming payment via UPI and OTP-based delivery in the Real App Experience section.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest non-goals explicitly say not to implement payments/UPI integration or OTP delivery flows (landing copy only). This copy introduces those flows as product details and may be considered beyond the requested landing copy.
